title: Topic 001 Question 015
body: Your network contains an Active Directory forest named contoso.com that is linked to an Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) tenant named contoso.com by using
You need to prevent the synchronization of users who have the extensionAttribute15 attribute set to NoSync.
What should you do in Azure AD Connect?
options: Create an inbound synchronization rule for the Windows Azure Active Directory connector.
Configure a Full Import run profile.
Create an inbound synchronization rule for the Active Directory Domain Services connector.
